commitcv.title: CommitCV
commitcv.description: CommitCV is a JSON based Latex resume parser, taking in a JSON file with your resume, parsing and outputting it to either PDF, .json, or .tex.

points.1: Developed a JSON based online resume editor using component based cards
points.2: Implemented an Express webserver endpoint to handle pdflatex conversions
points.3: Containerized the application using Docker to manage simple deployments

csdiscordbot.title: UManitoba Computer Science Discord Bot
csdiscordbot.description: The verification and moderation bot for the University of Manitoba's Computer Science discord. Used to help manage access to the server and link discord users to their university email.

points.1: Assisted in Development and Maintenance of the Moderation and Verification bot for the CS Discord Server
points.2: Developed Logging feature for Moderation Commands
points.3: Worked on integrating a Pocketbase database for data storage

rubysmb.title: Business website for Ruby's Paradise
rubysmb.description: Ruby's Paradise is a small business that runs both a driving range and arcade in Winnipeg Beach, MB. I was asked to help them create a website to help enhance their presence online and to have a place to direct customers to for enquiries.

points.1: Developed a responsive website with Next.js using Typescript
points.2: Designed website with an adaptable card style system for conveying information
points.3: Worked to ensure designs followed WCAG Colour Guidelines

tf.ca.title: Personal Portfolio Website
tf.ca.description: This is my third iteration of my personal portfolio website. The last revamp being in January 2025, working to showcase the new design and technical skills that I have developed since the last revamp.

points.1: Developed a personal portfolio website using Next.js with Typescript, and TailwindsCSS
points.2: Designed website with an adaptable card style system for conveying information
points.3: Hosted using a laptop and a Ubuntu VM on an app called Coolify
